nodes.text: ZEM-19ST was an elite Skytrooper, a type of battle droid used by the Eternal Empire of the planet Zakuul, that was among the Skytrooper forces deployed to board Darth Marr's flagship during a battle with the Eternal Fleet in 3636 BBY. The droid was destroyed in battle with an enemy combatant.

Skytrooper ZEM-19ST appears as an enemy in Chapter I: The Hunt in Knights of the Fallen Empire, a 2015 Digital Expansion to the BioWare's 2011 massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
